title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton and silk
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
inscribed: Inscription on red paper pasted onto textile.
description: Scroll (sutra) cover of printed cotton lined with yellow Chinese silk. Chintz (European) printed in geometric pattern with sprays of roses. Chinese silk lining has floral pattern as well.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th century.Medium: cotton and silk
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave. 1960-209-1.
